resources.string:
In this MapActivity i do not have a Place and Directions enabled Api.So 

 1. I am getting a place from the edittext shown in the top and convert it to latitude and longitude using Geocoder. After that i am placing a marker in that Location and directions button will be visible.

 2. I do not have directions enabled key so whenever i am passing the source and destinations location in directions api the result shows like REQUEST DENIED and does not draw poly line.

 Thank You
